channel.title: MITB/MSCP Podcast
channel.description:
Ok, so say we had a podcast running every week/month, it would explain new achievements, SOTW winners and new rules.
For those who dont know what podcasts are, theyre like the news, accept there made by average people, you download them via a RSS feed from a website which you can subscribe to, they come on mp3 formats so people can listen to them with any media players.
This would help the community by being able to listen to the MITB news anytime, say on an MP3 on the way to school. It could also reduce the needs for people who are in a rush and cant read everything.
Thats all I have to say.
:)

item.title: MITB/MSCP Podcast
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:29, topic:142031”]Any thought’s on this?

[quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=194397.msg1746857#msg1746857 date=1189474401]
And about the news feed. Every week, we could have a sticky asking for the most important events that happened. Stuff representative of the community, not simply the glorious stuff. Then at the end of the week, a selected user with a lot of free time goes through the list and picks out the best points. Finally, he posts it to the homepage OR somewhere else. Stuff like that. It will be interesting, and really no work needed on behalf of the mods.
[/quote][/quote]
No, that would be GAY.

Because, there would be 100 posts on
“DER R SKILLCAPES”

Read full topic

item.title: MITB/MSCP Podcast
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:19, topic:142031”][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=194397.msg1746800#msg1746800 date=1189473508]
Yeah and while we’re at it lets make a RSS feed of all the latest posts [/sarcasm]
[/quote]

What like this:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

It has always been there

I don’t know how podcasts work, plus I don’t have an iPod.[/quote]

Podcasts have nothing to do with ipods per se, it was just a trendy name people picked up on.

Basically, it’s a radio show, but on-demand, usually using rss/atom for notification of new episodes to podreaders.

It wouldn’t work for MITB, though, imo.

Read full topic

item.title: MITB/MSCP Podcast
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

I’d be happy to help myself, I think this place really does need a change in appearance.

The homepage, not the forums.

And about the news feed. Every week, we could have a sticky asking for the most important events that happened. Stuff representative of the community, not simply the glorious stuff. Then at the end of the week, a selected user with a lot of free time goes through the list and picks out the best points. Finally, he posts it to the homepage OR somewhere else. Stuff like that. It will be interesting, and really no work needed on behalf of the mods.

Read full topic

I’d be happy to help myself, I think this place really does need a change in appearance. Just another quick idea, how about the people that think we should do something about the site, and agree with me in some way make a channel on irc or talk on msn, and just brainstorm ideas, then we get together again after a bit of research, and we collect each others findings, and we compose a plan, of which we can present moparisthebest, and see what he thinks.
